thread.section_title: InMyArea.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InMyArea.com | inmyarea.com | 4 of 41
thread.title: Karole

author: Karole
title: Karole
text:
I have been very satisfied with my services with my current provider, but I wanted a lower price. I searched extensively to find a better deal for phone, internet and cable. I found phone at $17 mo. and internet TV at $20 a month, but internet/Wi-Fi . . . well, that wasn't working out so great. I spoke to Anthony about Spectrum and it was a pretty good deal but I wanted to look around before I decided. Anthony helped me with that too.
With taxes and mystery fees, my old bill was $ 170 a month. With Spectrum, my bill for phone/internet/cable will be about half as much.
No contract/commitment, so if I don't like it, I can move on, but this new service provides more than I had before, so, cool.
